author: dlr
msg: There was a discussion on IRC about whether JAF was needed at all.  It
was determined that JAF is required by JavaMail, so can't be dumped
from the distribution.  There was discussion about the FileItem
extending DataSource, but some hook elsewhere took advantage of it, so
the consensus was to leave it in.
